metadata.name: THE GREAT ANNIHILATOR.
metadata.description:
This photography series focuses on the concept of humankind searching for hope, putting faith and purpose into something greater than themselves.
I wanted to capture my own version of what landscape photography could be, I wanted to visually explore a grand concept, an idea of god.

Using a drone to carefully photograph the landscape framed for lighting and setting.
While using CG to compose the 3D monolith, creating this otherworldly object while still keeping it grounded to reality in the image.

This series is a collaboration between three artists coming together to make the vision happen.
The final sale will be split between the three artists.


Photographer & Creative Direction: Israel Riqueros
Drone Operator: Miguel Gallardo
Monolith artist: Lucas Lopez
